abstract: More than 100 former American ambassadors are urging Congress to support nuclear deal reached with Iran, saying it could halt Tehran's development of nuclear weapon if properly implemented.
lead_paragraph: More than 100 former American ambassadors wrote to President Obama, calling the deal a “landmark agreement” and urging Congress to support it.

headline.main: Former U.S. Diplomats Praise Iran Deal
headline.print_headline: Former U.S. Diplomats Write to Obama, Praising Iran Deal as ‘Landmark’ Accord

snippet: More than 100 former American ambassadors wrote to President Obama, calling the deal a “landmark agreement” and urging Congress to support it.
